safety.header:
Your safety is the most important to prevent spreading of the coronavirus!
Please follow the rules below:
safety.rule1:
Do not go outside without explicit necessity!
#StayAtHome
safety.rule2: Try to protect yourself as much as possible. Wear gloves and a mask when you leave the house.
safety.rule3: Regularly wash your hands with soap and water or clean them with an alcohol-based hand rub.
safety.rule4: Avoid touching eyes, nose and mouth. Hands touch many surfaces and can pick up viruses.
safety.rule5: Cover your mouth and nose with your bent elbow or tissue when you cough or sneeze.
safety.rule6: Maintain at least 1 metre distance between yourself and anyone who is coughing or sneezing, as well as your interlocutors.
safety.rule7: Touch surfaces including desks, tables, door handles, light switches, handrails must be wiped regularly with water and detergent or a disinfectant.
safety.rule8: If you have a fever, cough and difficulty breathing, seek medical attention and call in advance. Follow the directions of your local health authority.
safety.rule9: Keep up to date on the latest information about COVID-19.

auth.password-validation: Password must contain at least 6 signs, upper/lowercase and number
auth.start-help-description: Now you are ready to help. Find your teammates, create tasks and begin local kindness!
auth.sign-up-error: Something went wrong, try you internet connection
